title: Vollee font?
content:
I fount this really nice font in a logo called Vollee. (see attachment)  
But I don’t not seem to be able to find the lovely font.

Sites like whatthefont also have no clue.  
Do you know what the font is (or something close)?

Thx Stuart

author: stuarth

comments.content: This could very well be custom.
